SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Team Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_TEAM# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Member Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_MEMBER# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Running clear file command ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "createteam" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@UNIX
! Team name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_TEAM# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -teamname &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Member name : IF &UC4RB_VER_MEMBER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_MEMBER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -members &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT "Command executed :: &UC4RB_CMD#"
&UC4RB_CMD# !------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE TEAM ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE TEAM ACTION EXECUTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------Check error level -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
